The refunds feature is making this sale amazing.

>

As long as the refund comes through in a timely manner - I wouldn't want to be depending on it for a flash sale.

Elite Dangerous at 25% off just took a hefty bite out of my budgeted expenditure. At least there's not much else in the current sale that I really wanted.

EDIT:

Hello Icewind Dale, you thought I wouldn't notice you were also on sale at the same discount as Baldur's Gate 2...? You were wrong!

*The Daily Deals as listed on the front page don't seem to be the full extent of the Daily Deals. (This is often the case with the offers you see on the store page. Often if one item in a franchise is discounted, the other members of the franchise also get discounted.)*

Ooooo. The Secret World is on flash sale. \*yoink\*

Been a bit underwhelmed with this Steam sale. Maybe it's because the last year has been such a sucky time for games, but there's very little that I want. Bought Creeper World 3 because I loved the original browser version, but that's about it.

Have thought about buying Banished, Speed Runners or Terraria as they're all pretty cheap, but it just feels like buying something for the sake of it. I'm not sure I'd actually play any of them.

Anybody know of any good hidden gems around at the moment?

I picked up every Hitman game for just 8 bucks, after I saw the E3 promotional trailer for the new one.

I'd always wanted to get them, but the trailer helped justify my purchase ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I couldn't resist when Sid Meir's Pirates came up for $2.49.

And wow that game is fun.

> 
> I couldn't resist when Sid Meir's Pirates came up for $2.49.
> And wow that game is fun.

Love it (like I loved the original), but there's an awful lot of dancing for a pirate game.

Mail runner best ship.
aaaaand now I own Banished.

I haven't been real inspired this sale either. I was looking at Cities: Skylines, but I missed the daily on it. I'll wait and see if there's a Last Chance at the end like at Christmas. I got something like twelve games for $25ish then.

I'm gonna get Lego Worlds definitely, but since it's not part of the sale I'm waiting until I buy something else.
I got Prison Architect! I saw few gameplays when it was popular pretty darn good!

Well, I grabbed FSX and Skyrim: Legendary Edition for 18 bucks total. 4.99 for FSX, a $21 savings, and 13 bucks for Skyrim: legendary, which is 40 bucks normally. And if you buy everything from skyrim separately it would be $65 just for skyrim. I would say I did pretty good, saved $48 minimum. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
